title: Charming Margaret River Escape near Yallingup Beach & Award-Winning Wineries with Daily Breakfast
description:
Experience the charm of the Margaret River wine region with a stay in this beautifully restored heritage building, just a stone's throw from the famed Ngilgi Cave, Yallingup Beach and Canal Rocks. Surrounded by sparkling sandy beaches, dramatic caves and cliffsides, this historic hotel offers a peaceful retreat in the quaint town of Yallingup.

With over 100 years of history as the local watering hole, Caves House Hotel is known for its vibrant music scene, offering regular events and live music shows that draw in both locals and tourists. Soak up the sun, take in the lively atmosphere at the Beer Garden and indulge in pub-style dining with a seasonal twist.
offer_address: 18 Yallingup Beach Road, Yallingup, Western Australia 6282, Australia

title: Beachfront Apartment Stay Near the Margaret River Wine Region
description: Enjoy the beauty of Western Australia at Canal Rocks Beachfront Apartments, conveniently located within easy driving distance of the Margaret River Wine Region and Eagle Bay. Stay in a self-contained, oceanfront apartment for either two or four people, with a welcome bottle of wine, late checkout and grazing board included.

title: Secluded Adults-Only Retreat Amid the Picturesque Margaret River
description: Escape to where the world can’t find you, in the heart of Western Australia’s premier wine region at the blissful Injidup Spa Retreat - a sanctuary of peace and tranquility set on a pristine beach with just ten, luxurious, adults-only villas. Soak up spectacular ocean views, relax in isolated bliss and enjoy a welcome breakfast hamper filled with goods, a bottle of red and white wine, a sumptuous two-course lunch at Aravina Estate with a glass of wine per person and a AU$50 spa credit per person.

title: Adults-Only Sanctuary in Picturesque Margaret River with Gourmet Inclusions
description:
Escape to a place where the rest of the world fades into insignificance in the heart of Western Australia’s premier wine region, staying at the secluded Injidup Spa Retreat - a sanctuary of peace and tranquillity. Perched high on the cliffs above Injidup Beach with just ten luxurious, adults-only plunge pool villas, all strategically positioned for drinking in the spectacular ocean views, here you'll enjoy a sense of inner harmony where the sound of the ocean drifting through an open window awaits you.

Relax and enjoy a sumptuous two-course lunch at Aravina Estate with a glass of wine per person, a gourmet hamper filled with local specialities, one bottle of red or white wine from the renowned Snake + Herring winery, a welcome breakfast hamper, a guaranteed 12pm late checkout and more.

title: Secluded Adults-Only Retreat Amid the Picturesque Margaret River
description: Escape to where the world can’t find you, in the heart of Western Australia’s premier wine region at the blissful Injidup Spa Retreat - a sanctuary of peace and tranquillity set on a pristine beach with just ten, luxurious, adults-only villas. Soak up spectacular ocean views, relax in isolated bliss and enjoy a sumptuous two-course lunch at Aravina Estate with a glass of wine per person, an AU$50 gourmet hamper filled with local specialities, one bottle of red wine and one bottle of white wine from the renowned Snake + Herring winery, a gourmet breakfast hamper and a guaranteed 12pm late checkout.

title: Heritage-Listed Escape in the Heart of Margaret River
description: Discover the beauty and taste the fresh produce of the Margaret River region with a stay at the magnificently restored, heritage-listed Caves House Hotel, a quintessential Australian property offering self-contained apartments in the quaint town of Yallingup. Stay in a modern, one-bedroom apartment and enjoy daily buffet breakfast and a bottle of Caves House Hotel’s signature Cabernet Merlot.
